title: Pasta Carbonara
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente.
In a medium bowl, whisk together eggs and Parmesan cheese.
In a large skillet, cook pancetta over medium heat until crisp.
Add garlic to the skillet and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Drain pasta, reserving 1/2 cup of pasta water.
Add pasta to the skillet and toss to coat.
Slowly pour the egg mixture into the skillet, stirring constantly to avoid scrambling the eggs.
Add reserved pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
